--- select_literals_float.sql
SELECT
  123.456e-3,
  .1E4,
  58.,
  4e2

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      41,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  19,
        Expr: &parser.FloatLit{
          pos:   9,
          end:   19,
          Value: "123.456e-3",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  23,
        end:  27,
        Expr: &parser.FloatLit{
          pos:   23,
          end:   27,
          Value: ".1E4",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  31,
        end:  34,
        Expr: &parser.FloatLit{
          pos:   31,
          end:   34,
          Value: "58.",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  38,
        end:  41,
        Expr: &parser.FloatLit{
          pos:   38,
          end:   41,
          Value: "4e2",
        },
        Star: false,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From:    parser.FromItemList{},
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT 123.456e-3, .1E4, 58., 4e2
